keyword: calories in a starbucks skinny vanilla latte
title: Calories in a Starbucks Skinny Vanilla Latte
meta_description: Discover calories in a Starbucks skinny vanilla latte (grande size), including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and tweaks for customizations.
h1: Calories in a Starbucks Skinny Vanilla Latte
assumptions: Grande (16 oz) size, nonfat milk, sugar-free vanilla syrup, espresso; standard Starbucks recipe.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, customizations, location, and recipe changes. Check Starbucks app or labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A grande Starbucks Skinny Vanilla Latte has 130 calories, 13 g protein, and 0 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Venti size (20 oz) instead of grande

faqs.q: How many calories in a grande Starbucks skinny vanilla latte?
faqs.a: 130 calories for a standard grande serving.

faqs.q: What's the protein content in a Starbucks skinny vanilla latte?
faqs.a: 13 g protein per grande serving from nonfat milk.

faqs.q: Is a Starbucks skinny vanilla latte low-fat?
faqs.a: Yes, it has 0 g total fat using nonfat milk.

faqs.q: What's the difference in calories between skinny and regular vanilla latte?
faqs.a: Skinny is ~130 kcal (grande); regular adds ~80-100 kcal from whole milk and sugary syrup.

faqs.q: How many calories in a tall Starbucks skinny vanilla latte?
faqs.a: About 100 kcal for the 12 oz tall size.
